name: Battle Fight
description:
Online Multiplayer Game. With 50 players strength. This is a Server Connected Game and will get update by itself no need to update manually.

Game Engine: pixworld.io

Language: HTML5

This Game is in early access and will contain updates in future, you are requested if you get any trouble in the game kindly report it to protecgamesofficial@gmail.com 

If this Game is not comparative with your device Play it Online
